title: A Spoonful of sugar
brief_description: The network of cane farms and sugar mills in the valleys along the Queensland coast, which is the basis of the Australian sugar industry. The film shows something of the life of the cane cutters, and concludes with a demonstration of the whole process of extracting and refining sugar for the table.
